name: BallExit
description:
Exit the balls!!

Eaaaaaaasssssy to Play, Hard to finish!

The BallExit game has evolved into a hyper-casual Puzzle game that anyone can enjoy.

Aim the ball, Throw, Bounce ~Bounce, and Exit

Enjoy addictive games from simple control and exciting puzzle

Achieve your best stage!

[Game Features]
- Simple Rules of Casual Puzzle Games
- Play anytime, anywhere with no time limit!
- You can play without internet.
- Gamecenter function support
